name: Davis Motomiya
effects: [Start of Your Turn] If you have 2 memory or less, set your memory to 3.
[On Play] Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Add 1 blue and 1 green Digimon card among them to your hand. Place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.
securityEffects: [Security] Play this card without paying its memory cost.

name: Ken Ichijoji
effects: [Start of Your Turn] If you have 2 memory or less, set your memory to 3.
[Your Turn] When one of your green or blue Digimon deletes an opponent's Digimon in battle and survives, you may suspend this Tamer to gain 1 memory.
securityEffects: [Security] Play this card without paying its memory cost.

name: Izzy Izumi
effects: [Start of Your Turn] If you have 2 memory or less, set your memory to 3.
[On Play] Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. If all of the revealed cards are black, gain 1 memory. Place the cards on top of your deck in any order.
securityEffects: [Security] Play this card without paying its memory cost.

name: Tai Kamiya
effects: [Your Turn] All of your Digimon get +1000 DP.
securityEffects: [Security] Play this card without paying its memory cost.

name: Sakuttomon
inheritedEffects: [Your Turn][Once Per Turn] When you play another Digimon with [Legend-Arms] in its traits by an effect, gain 1 memory.

name: Zubamon
effects: [On Play] By placing this Digimon under 1 of your other Digimon that's black or has [Legend-Arms] in its traits as its bottom digivolution card, you may reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a Digimon card with [Legend-Arms] in its traits and a play cost of 7 or less, you may play it without paying its memory cost. Add the rest to your hand.
inheritedEffects: [When Attacking] If you have a Digimon that's black or has [Legend-Arms] in its traits in play, delete 1 of your opponent's Digimon with 3000 DP or less.

name: ZubaEagermon
effects: [On Play] By placing this Digimon under 1 of your other Digimon that's black or has [Legend-Arms] in its traits as its bottom digivolution card, delete 1 of your opponent's Digimon with 5000 DP or less.
inheritedEffects: [When Attacking] If you have a Digimon that's black or has [Legend-Arms] in its traits in play, delete 1 of your opponent's Digimon with 3000 DP or less.

name: Duramon
effects: [Your Turn] When this Digimon would digivolve into a card in your hand that's black or has [Legend-Arms] in its traits, reduce the digivolution cost by 1.
inheritedEffects: [End of Your Turn] You may DNA digivolve this Digimon and one of your other Digimon in play into a Digimon card in your hand for its DNA digivolve cost.

name: Durandamon
effects: [Your Turn][Once Per Turn] When one of your effects places a digivolution card under this Digimon, this Digimon gets +3000 DP and <Security Attack +1> for the turn. (This Digimon checks 1 additional security card.)

[When Attacking] Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. You may play 1 Digimon card with [Legend-Arms] in its traits and a play cost of 7 or less among them without paying its memory cost. Place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.
inheritedEffects: [Your Turn] While this Digimon is [RagnaLoardmon], it doesn't activate [Security] effects on Option cards it checks.

name: RagnaLoardmon
effects: DNA Digivolution: 0 from red Lv.6 + black Lv.6

[When Digivolving] <Blitz> (This Digimon can attack when your opponent has 1 or more memory.) When DNA digivolving, for every 4 cards in this Digimon's digivolution cards, delete 1 of your opponent's Digimon with a play cost of 20 or less and trash the top card of your opponent's security stack.
[All Turns][Once Per Turn] When a card is removed from a player's security stack, unsuspend this Digimon.

name: Chikurimon
effects: [All Turns] Players can't reduce play costs.

name: Ludomon
effects: [On Play] By placing this Digimon under 1 of your other Digimon that's red or has [Legend-Arms] in its traits as its bottom digivolution card, you may reveal the top card of your deck. You may play 1 Digimon card with [Legend-Arms] in its traits and a play cost of 7 or less among them without paying its memory cost. Add the rest to your hand.
inheritedEffects: [Opponent's Turn] While you have a Digimon that's red or has [Legend-Arms] in its traits in play, this Digimon gains <Blocker>. (When an opponent's Digimon attacks, you may suspend this Digimon to force the opponent to attack it instead.)

name: TiaLudomon
effects: [On Play] By placing this Digimon under 1 of your other Digimon that's red or has [Legend-Arms] in its traits as its bottom digivolution card, 1 of your Digimon gains <Reboot> until the end of your opponent's turn. (Unsuspend this Digimon during your opponent's unsuspend phase.)
inheritedEffects: [Opponent's Turn] While you have a Digimon that's red or has [Legend-Arms] in its traits in play, this Digimon gains <Blocker>. (When an opponent's Digimon attacks, you may suspend this Digimon to force the opponent to attack it instead.)

name: RaijiLudomon
effects: [Opponent's Turn] This Digimon can't be deleted by your opponent's effects.
inheritedEffects: [End of Your Turn] You may DNA digivolve this Digimon and one of your other Digimon in play into a Digimon card in your hand for its DNA digivolve cost.

name: BryweLudramon
effects: [Your Turn][Once Per Turn] When one of your effects places a digivolution card under this Digimon, your opponent's effects can't delete this Digimon or return it to its owner's hand or deck until the end of their turn.

[When Digivolving] Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. You may play 1 Digimon card with [Legend-Arms] in its traits and a play cost of 7 or less among them without paying its memory cost. Place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.
inheritedEffects: [Opponent's Turn] While this Digimon is [RagnaLoardmon], it isn't affected by the effects of your opponent's Digimon.

name: Direct Smasher
effects: While you have a Digimon with [Legend-Arms] in its traits in play, you may use this card without meeting its color requirements.
[Main] Delete 1 of your opponent's Digimon with the highest DP.

name: Legend-Arms Alliance
effects: [Main] You may play 1 Digimon card with [Legend-Arms] in its traits and a play cost of 7 or less in your hand without paying its memory cost. Then, place this card in your Battle Area.
[Main] <Delay> (Trash this card in your battle area to activate the effect below. You can't activate this effect the turn this card enters play.)
・Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Place those cards on the top or bottom of your deck in any order.
securityEffects: [Security] You may play 1 Digimon card with [Legend-Arms] in its traits and a play cost of 7 or less in your hand without paying its memory cost. Then, place this card in your Battle Area.

name: T.K. Takaishi
effects: [Opponent's Turn] All of your Security Digimon get +2000 DP.
securityEffects: [Security] Play this card without paying its memory cost.

name: Matt Ishida
effects: [Your Turn] When one of your Digimon is deleted, you may suspend this Tamer to gain 1 memory.
securityEffects: [Security] Play this card without paying its memory cost.
